p: To test the exploratory MRI hypothesis, we will examine the AD ‘signature’ of average cortical thickness of 9 ROIs examined quantitatively by a cortical surface-based reconstruction and analysis. 49 The 9 ROIs are medial temporal cortex, inferior temporal gyrus, temporal pole, angular gyrus, superior frontal gyrus, superior parietal lobule, supramarginal gyrus, precuneus and inferior frontal sulcus. Whole brain cortical thickness will be an additional measure in the VALAD Trial.
